infos.title: Shadow Hunter
infos.dislike: His fellow kinsmen who let his sister die
infos.story: This lonely Dark Elf swore vengeance against his own race for the death of his sister. Having barely survived his deployment to the Aegina Desert, the only thing waiting for him back home was the dreadful news that his sister had been killed as an Elven sacrelifice. As he cried out her name in the darkness, he began succumbing to madness. Eventually, he swore an oath of hatred and vengeance against his own kind, the murderers of his sister.
infos.story_: This lonely Dark Elf swore vengeance against his own race for the death of his sister. Having barely survived his deployment to the Aegina Desert, the only thing waiting for him back home was the dreadful news that his sister had been killed as an Elven sacrifice. As he cried out her name in the darkness, he began succumbing to madness. Eventually, he swore an oath of hatred and vengeance against his own kind, the murderers of his sister.

2.name: Black Shackle
2.description: Deals ??? M.DMG to enemies in range and shackles them for 6 sec.

3.name: Shadow Wave
3.description: Deals ??? M.DMG to enemies in a straight line and inflicts Blind for 6 sec.

4.name: Black Stain
4.description: Each auto attack deals extra ??? M.DMG that ignores target's M.DEF.

light.effect: If there is 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.

dark.effect: Has a 25% chance of Blinding the enemy for 5 sec.

light.effect: Mana cost is increased by 1 orb but DMG is boosted by 100%.

dark.effect: Dispels positive effects of all enemies in range.
There is a 10% chance that **Skill 1** is fired upon an auto-attack.
Upon auto attacking, deal extra M.DMG worth 80% of ATK and recover 100 mana. There is a 10% chance of dealing double DMG and recovering double mana.

uw.name: Tears of the Moon, Nerius
uw.description: Each attack has a (0) chance of dealing (1) of ATK as M.DMG, and all skill cooldowns are reduced by 10%.
uw.story: A treasure of the Dark Elves created using a powerful moonlight stone from Arrovina and a moon tree branch of the highest quality. Nerius is a perfect medium for Moonlight Magic, and it is one of the most powerful magic weapons of the Dark Elves. However, it is said that the beautiful silver light of the moon can easily be tainted by darkness. A sublime love has turned into deep darkness, and the dark elf longing for vengeance has fused that darkness into this weapon.

1.name: Vow of Black Moon
1.description: [Dark Rampage] Dispels all negative effects from self and reduces Cooldown by (0) sec.
1.story: One of the daggers that Dimael shared with his comrades dispatched in Aegina. When the Black Moon rose in the desert sky, he gave them these daggers and they all vowed to face their destiny. They supported each other and tended to each other's wounds while fighting the evil creatures storming out from the rift. However, he was the only one who returned alive from Aegina.

2.name: Unbreakable Bracelet
2.description: [Black Shackle] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the target by (0) for 10 sec.
2.story: A bracelet that was shared with Epigael a long time ago. It has shadow morion hanging, which is a precious jewel amongst the Dark Elves. It is said that those who cut off the shadow morion and will have a thread of their souls, which will lead them to meet again in the next life.

3.name: Eye of Shadows
3.description: [Shadow Wave] DMG is increased by 50% and Blind duration is increased by (0) sec.
3.story: Tear fragments of the beast Heltanios, who lived at the bottom of the Fountain of Life. It spews out pitch darkness, and those who see its eyes end up having their souls stolen by the powerful dark energy. Those who become the master of these eyes will obtain great power and insight. When Dimael was captured in Aegina and was at the brink of death, Maria embedded these eye fragments.

4.name: Black Crown
4.description: [Black Stain] Increases the Range of normal attacks by 20%, each hit increasing DMG by (0). This effect can be stacked up to max 10 times.
4.story: The crown of Dark Elves. Remebering the fall and tragedy of his race and the royal family, Dimael still can't wear this bloody crown. All he can do is watch it and wait for the day the true king of Dark Elves appears.

sw.requirement: Charges up upon using Skills 5 times.
sw.description: Summons the soul of Tears of the Moon, Nerius, dealing ??? M.DMG to frontal enemies and inflicting them with [Curse of the Moon] for 10 sec. Targets inflicted with [Curse of the Moon] take 25% increased M.DMG and have their Heal Rate reduced by 25%. Afterward, increases own Crit DMG by 50%.

advancement.1: Increases DMG by 50% and changes the M.DMG Boost effect to 45%.
advancement.2: For the duration of Skill, Increases own ATK by 40%.

sw.story:
Nerius had long feared the horrible memories that were engraved into Dimael's heart.
Afer he lost his Friends, family, and everything, Dimael's hear was like a wasteland unable to hold anything.

Dimael even refused to draw the power of the moon that Nerius radiated.
Perhaps Dimael wished to deny his Dark Elven heritage.

However, it all changed when the mark of oath showed itself once again on his hand. Seeing the mark of oath return, it reminded Dimael of that time when he and his comrades branded that mark under the dark moonlight, Dimael's cold heart started beating vigorously.

Dimael changed.

To protect those precious to him, Dimael swore to lead the Dark Elves into the world. As Dimael roared and let out a fierce cry, the great darkness his soul reflected converged with the power of the moon that flows within Dimael's Dark Elven vein.

Nerius, embraced by the great eclipse of Dimael, kneeled and answered her legendary Dark Elven master's call.
